sections.css: @import "base/_lcc-logo";

sections.description:
Our logo is used across a variety of our sites, applications and other media

THe default preference is to present the logo as an SVG however it is also used in other image formates such as PNG and JPG.

sections.css: @import "base/_colors";

sections.description: Our primary colour is Teal. This should be used across our communications. It is supported by our primary shades (Peacock, Mint and Pistachio) to create compositions for Leicester City Council and its brand identity.

variables.name: color-combos
variables.value:
(
  black: ($black, $white, $white),
  white: ($white, $black, $black),
  blue: ($twitter-blue, $black, $black),
  orange: ($orange, $black, $black),
  dark-orange: ($dark-orange, $black, $black),
  lime: ($lime-green, $black, $black),
  teal: ($teal, $white, $white),
  peacock: ($peacock, $white, $white),
  mint: ($mint, $black, $black),
  pistacho: ($pistachio, $black, $black)
)

variables.name: font-family-sans-serif
variables.value: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol" !default

variables.name: font-family-monospace
variables.value: SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, "Liberation Mono", "Courier New", monospace !default

variables.name: btn-transition
variables.value: color .15s ease-in-out, background-color .15s ease-in-out, border-color .15s ease-in-out, box-shadow .15s ease-in-out !default

variables.name: navbar-dark-toggler-icon-bg
variables.value: str-replace(url("data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf8,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 30 30' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath stroke='#{$navbar-dark-color}' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-miterlimit='10' d='M4 7h22M4 15h22M4 23h22'/%3E%3C/svg%3E"), "#", "%23") !default

variables.name: navbar-light-toggler-icon-bg
variables.value: str-replace(url("data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf8,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 30 30' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath stroke='#{$navbar-light-color}' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-miterlimit='10' d='M4 7h22M4 15h22M4 23h22'/%3E%3C/svg%3E"), "#", "%23") !default
